comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Wystan: John J. Graham and George M. Levy were the lawyers who defended Mrs. Edwin Carman in her trial for the murder of Lulu Bailey (New York Times, July 9, 1914 and Aug 1, 1914).  We will add their fuller names when we update the image description.
